channel.title: I don't even know where to start. Physician issues
channel.description:
#### What happened? Game was down to: Me (Physician), Prince, Cult Leader, Evil King, Reaper It said two nights in a row someone tried to change my target, but I was immune.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Not that. There was no one in the game that could change my target and if there wasn't I shouldn't have been immune to it. Reaper claimed Drunk so I assume it was him and there was a CW barriering me. When... none of those things was correct. A drunk was alive at one point so maybe I remembered wrong and he was debauching me, but I still couldn't be immune to it, unless Physicians secretly got occ immunity.
#### Steps to reproduce: God only knows.
#### Comments: We lost because the Reaper's claim was pretty solid thanks to me getting "debauched" and "barriered".

item.title: I don't even know where to start. Physician issues
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
I hadn’t been occupied ever.

There were 2 attempts, but they both failed, though they shouldn’t have since there was nothing that would make me occ immune in the game.

Read full topic
item.source: I don't even know where to start. Physician issues

item.title: I don't even know where to start. Physician issues
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
well without knowing the full context of the game etc… one thing to note is any class is occupy immune if they are occupied/redirected 3 times. Meaning if say on n1 a butler and drunk visited you, than on n2 someone else occupied you… you’d be occupy immune for the rest of the game.

Read full topic
item.source: I don't even know where to start. Physician issues

item.title: I don't even know where to start. Physician issues
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
What happened?

Game was down to: Me (Physician), Prince, Cult Leader, Evil King, Reaper
It said two nights in a row someone tried to change my target, but I was immune.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Not that. There was no one in the game that could change my target and if there wasn’t I shouldn’t have been immune to it. Reaper claimed Drunk so I assume it was him and there was a CW barriering me. When… none of those things was correct. A drunk was alive at one point so maybe I remembered wrong and he was debauching me, but I still couldn’t be immune to it, unless Physicians secretly got occ immunity.

Steps to reproduce:

God only knows.

Comments:

We lost because the Reaper’s claim was pretty solid thanks to me getting “debauched” and “barriered”.

Read full topic
